[CBM] Sakura Wars the Movie (Dual Audio) [BDRip-720p-8bit]

* Based on the plot of the game Sakura Wars 3.

While the game features Lieutenant Oogami, the main character who takes off for Paris, narrates
one side of the story, the movie unveils the secrets behind Hanagumi. Oogami leaves for Paris,
consequently leaving Hanagumi without a leader; thus a new character will be introduced here.
To be replaced with Lieutenant Oogami is the former leader of Hoshigumi, Ratchet Altair - a
rationalistic and distinct individual, who brings about serious problems to Hanagumi.
The members are now in discord with Ratchet. Meanwhile, Teikoku Kagekidan was being
threatened by some irrelevant demons and a new type of anti-kouma mechas,
(brought by an american company) appears and tries to replace the koubu-kai.
Having made repeated mistakes due to the absence of Oogami, Hanagumi is now
faced with an unprecedented danger, while the abolishment of Teikoku Kagekidan
Hanagumi is being schemed. 



VIDEO

Video Resolution: 1280x688p HD (1.85:1)
